Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Randolph/ Stetson
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses rerouted Southbound buses will operate via Wacker & State. Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus & Wacker

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Randolph/ Stetson, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Wacker and State

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #54 Cicero Reroute near Cicero/18th
ShortDescription: Southbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via 6th, 46th, 19st, and resume reg route on Cicero: due to street blockage near Cicero/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via 6th, 46th, 19st, and resume reg route on Cicero: due to street blockage near Cicero/18th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #21 Cermak Westbound Reroute near Cicero/18th
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via 16th, 46th, 19st, and resume reg route on Cicero: due to street blockage near Cicero/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via 16th, 46th, 19st, and resume reg route on Cicero: due to street blockage near Cicero/18th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
